alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jackson and Vinton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Kingston, or 13 miles east of Chillicothe, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellston, Mcarthur, Lake Hope State Park, Hamden, Zaleski, Allensville, Creola, Eagle Mills and Byer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
